articles.title: US Futures Slip on Trump Tariffs, Crude Surges - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian shares dropped along with US stock-index futures as trade tensions dialed up, prompting investors to hold back on taking risky bets. Gold rose in demand for safe haven assets.
